product_name: Bio-OilSkincare Oil for Scars and Stretch Marks
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganGive BackBio-Oil Skincare Oil reduces the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more.
details: DetailsBenefitsRepairs skin damage to improve the appearance of scars and stretch marksNon-comedogenic moisturizing oil for all skin types that won't clog poresImproves the appearance of uneven skin toneKey IngredientsVitamin A Oil promotes the formation of new collagen and assists in skin renewal, increasing skin elasticityVitamin E helps maintain healthy skin and prevents agingChamomile, Sunflower, and Lavender Oils are anti-inflammatory plant-based oilsResearch Results82% of participants saw an improvement in scars92% of participants saw an improvement in stretch marks86% of participants saw an improvement in uneven skin toneItem 2226811How To UseApply twice daily for a minimum of 3 months. During pregnancy apply twice daily from the start of the second trimester.Precautions: For external use only. Do not ingest. Do not use on broken skin. In the unlikely event of skin irritation, discontinue use.IngredientsParaffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Triisononanoin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Isopropyl Myristate, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, BHT, Bisabolol, Parfum (Fragrance).
how_to_use: Apply twice daily for a minimum of 3 months. During pregnancy apply twice daily from the start of the second trimester.Precautions: For external use only. Do not ingest. Do not use on broken skin. In the unlikely event of skin irritation, discontinue use.

reviews.headline: Always a staple
reviews.comments:
Love using this as it absorbs so quickly after a bath.
I do recommend it as a way to keep moisturized in all weathers. It has never failed and now I'm using as a scar treatment post surgery I hope it minimizes scar

reviews.headline: Best hydration
reviews.comments: I love this it hydrates my skin.. it's the best oil ..

reviews.headline: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil  Is The Best!
reviews.comments: Have used this body oil for months. I use it was soon as I get out of the shower and give it time to absorb. It says it is great for scars and stretch marks but it is also just a great body oil. I have tried several others and always come back to this.

reviews.headline: Very hydrating
reviews.comments: Weird smell

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I recently developed late onset shellfish allergy, and got horrible hives all over my body.  I'll use this every night before bed and my skin feels better and there doesn't seem to be any scarring from the hives üôèüèª.

reviews.headline: The best body oil
reviews.comments: This has the best light weight texture oil and va nice frangrant.

reviews.headline: Love Bio-Oil Skincare Oil
reviews.comments: Bio- Oil really works for my skin! I have smoother & more supple skin now.

reviews.headline: I would purchase this product again.
reviews.comments: I purchase this product a week ago & I noticed the change in my scares.

reviews.headline: !!!CONSISTENCY IS KEY!!!
reviews.comments: You HAVE to be CONSISTENT for it to work and you see results!! You won't see results in 1week! I say give it 2! The product is expensive BUT A little goes a long way! Apply a few dots and rub it in. I swear by this product !! I use it everyday! Morning and bedore bed of course on a clean fresh face after brushing teeth and cleaninf hands !

reviews.headline: Surgical scars
reviews.comments: Im using this to treat my breast lift scars. Been using it for 2 weeks twice a day and my scars feel and look smoother

reviews.headline: Pregnancy oil
reviews.comments: I used this product while i was pregnant and would mix it with my cocoa butter lotion so i can be extra hydrated and it worked wonders. Alone without the lotion it would take a bit of time to dry so that is the only con to me about this skin oil but i didnt get one stretch mark during pregnancy so overall it served it purpose

reviews.headline: Favorite skin oil!
reviews.comments: The scent of this oil reminds me of so many happy skin days! I love this oil for facial cleansing and deep hydration with foundation. It is lightweight and great for treating scars. It is super clean and does not cause acne. It is a useful oil designed specifically for facial skin. Great brand!

reviews.headline: This does work you just have to be consistent
reviews.comments: I bought thia to help fade an old burn scar from hot oil. I use it daily and will say that after going through a bottle and a half I have noticed the scar faded overtime. I think the oil smells good and a little goes a long way, any excess I use on my stretch marks.

reviews.headline: I think it is a great product
reviews.comments: I have been using Bio Oil twice a day for years.   It is supposed to help with discoloration but I don't see any change in my hands.   Maybe it has helped prevent more age spots but with nothing to compare it to, I don't notice it.   It has really helped with wrinkles.   The fine wrinkles at the corner of my eyes and above my lip are much less obvious and the deep wrinkles can be seen but they feel so much less deep.   I think it works great on wounds that are slow in healing as well.   Keep in mind that it takes years to see a big difference.   I didn't see any major change in my deep wrinkles for at least a year, I could feel a difference but not really see a difference.   I will continue to use it as I really believe in it and the impact it as on my aging skin.  I am in my 60s and have fair skin.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Thos product works wonders witj or without a moisturizer. I love it!

reviews.headline: Miracle
reviews.comments: I always get this product before& after I have children. Works wonders

reviews.headline: Miracle
reviews.comments: I always get this product before& after I have children. Works wonders

reviews.headline: Magical!
reviews.comments: I used this product on my dark purple stretchmarks  and they went away completely. My daughter is 16 and had bad red scars on her face and back. we saw a difference after sleeping in the oil one night. Now she applies it morning and night and After a few days her skin looks so much better!

reviews.headline: Bio Oil
reviews.comments: It feels very greasy, and doesn't work for me at all. It also has a very strong, unpleasant smell. I would not recommend this product.

reviews.headline: The Best
reviews.comments: Love this product, it lasts all night and makes my skin feel nice and soft. I purchased this for my pregnancy to help with the elasticity and prevent stretch marks. Would recommend this product.

media.headline: Disappointing! Yikes! Horrible Rash, so disappointed.
Disappointing! Yikes! Horrible Rash, so disappointed.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am 20 years old, and have had very severe acne scarring. I go to the dermatologist, and have everything from Retina, Tazorac, special cleansers, and sulfar-based lotions (for those of you familiar with dermatologist products). I was so desperate to get rid of my scarring, that I decided to try this to even my skin tone and lighten my scars. WOW! Im only on DAY 4, and my scars are already 35% better! Everyone around me, after DAY 2, started complimenting me on how good my skin looked! (and I wasnt wearing any makeup)

The routine I started:(NIGHTLY, after evening cleanse)
I get a facecloth and soak it under hot water. I ring out the excess water, then place the towel on my face to open my pores. I quickly pat my face dry with a seperate towel, and then apply the oil generously. I resoak the towel in steaming hot water, squeeze out all the excess water again, and place it on my face (now that the oil is on) and let it steam my face and open my pores to let the oil seep into my skin. When the towel has lost its heat, I do this a second time. Then, I leave my skin AS IS. Let it dry naturally, so that as my pores close up and any leftover oil on the surface remains on the surface or closes into my pores.
faceoff_positive.headline: Wow, its actually working!

faceoff_negative.comments: I read many reviews and was so disappointed. Used on my legs for age spots from sun damage and also stretch marks on my stomach from pregnancy. The first 3 days was fine, smell was a little strong for me but I was determined to use this 2 times a day and see awesome results like everyone seems to be saying. Well about the 4th day I noticed a rash on my stomach and 5th day noticed it spread brown on the front of my legs and all the way down to feet. Rash also spread around to back of legs and back of knees, & HOLY COW !!!!  I had no idea what it was and it kept getting worse and itchy and spreading. The only thing different I could figure out was the oil, and the rash is only in the spots where I applied the oil. I thought... huh, no way! Well, upon further reviews I found a huge group of people describing red itchy bumps that appeared after a few days of use also. So user beware, try on a patch of skin for 4 days or so and see how your skin reacts to the oil. So disappointed people didn't even comment on some of these major sites about some negative things. So please test before using on a large area, especially since I normally never have sensitive or problem skin. Have not used in about 4 days and the rash is still really red, bumpy and spreading, hoping it goes away quickly.
faceoff_negative.headline: Disappointing! Yikes! Horrible Rash, so disappointed.
